line_1: What wife was suspected, what daughter elop'd,
line_2: What thief was detected, that 'twas to be hop'd,

line_1: What wife was suspected, what daughter elop'd,
line_2: The rascals would all be convicted, and rop'd;

line_1: When Helen from her lord elop'd.
line_2: Here first the happy Paris stopp'd,
